key_features: 1.6% Unlimited cashback on all local spend
2X TREATS Points for every S$1 spent on foreign currency transactions
Stand a chance to watch FC Barcelona LIVE in Camp Nou every football season
5% discount at the FCBotiga official store in Camp Nou
Complimentary travel insurance coverage of up to S$300,000
overseas_spending: 2X TREATS Points for every S$1 spent on foreign currency transactions
No minimum spend and no cap on spending
Enjoy 5% discount on merchandise at the FCBotiga official store at Camp Nou in Barcelona, Spain
cash_back: 1.6% Unlimited cashback on all local spend
No minimum spend and no cashback cap

online_shopping: 1.6% Unlimited cashback on all local spend

fees.annual_fee_waiver: Available with a total yearly minimum spend of S$10,000
fees.annual_interest_rate: 27.90% p.a. subject to a minimum charge of S$3.00
fees.late_payment_fee: 5% of the minimum monthly repayment or S$100, whichever is higher, if minimum monthly repayment is not received by due date
fees.minimum_monthly_repayment: 3% of outstanding balance or S$20, whichever is higher
fees.foreign_transaction_fee: All transactions in foreign currency will be subject to an administrative fee of 2.25% and a currency conversion charge of 1% imposed by the respective card associations
fees.cash_advance_fee: 8% of the transaction amount or S$15, whichever is higher
